main.name: I'm Domenic Pittari
main.candlelightContent: Developed a robust full-stack project centered around user authentication, seamlessly securing user accounts. The platform efficiently loads and manages user-created notes and tasks, providing a streamlined and secure experience for users.
main.projectMVCContent: Immerse yourself in a dynamic battlefield where waves of enemies relentlessly challenge your skills. The game features a sophisticated enemy wave spawner system that keeps players on their toes, ensuring an ever-intensifying experience.
main.projectLuminaContent: Embark on a relentless journey through the ever-changing landscapes of Lumina, a dynamic roguelite adventure that challenges players with procedurally generated levels and an extensible character controller.
